body_html: I'm not trained to be a TensorFlow reviewer, but I just wanted to comment that this is an important feature, contributed by the authors of the paper that introduced the method. My team is likely to use this metric in several of our research papers and we'd like it to be added to TensorFlow to encourage the general community to use it as well. I'm a co-author of the existing "Inception Score" metric that is already in TensorFlow, and I believe researchers should abandon Inception Score and switch to the new metric.

body: I'm not trained to be a TensorFlow reviewer, but I just wanted to comment that this is an important feature, contributed by the authors of the paper that introduced the method. My team is likely to use this metric in several of our research papers and we'd like it to be added to TensorFlow to encourage the general community to use it as well. I'm a co-author of the existing "Inception Score" metric that is already in TensorFlow, and I believe researchers should abandon Inception Score and switch to the new metric.
